Name: Osmorrow
About the game: Adventure Mode An adventure set on the planet of Osmorrow, where the Ogre clan has run rampant. You are sent to aid the ambassador following reports of massive raids in the city of Esterdron led by the evil Ogres. These invasive Ogre clan raids have been assaulting and enslaving the people of Esterdron. Your mission is to help restore peace and order to this world as you liberate Osmorrow from the Ogre oppression. Siege Mode A rogue-like dungeon mode with a simple objective: Get as far as you can. You might find a new weapon around any corner or an enemy might find you instead. Features Fast Paced combat Sandbox combo system 2 game modes: Adventure, Siege High difficulty and Skill Cap Controller Support Follow us for announcements of future content.
